page.title: 06FARMING AROUND SMANNELL
page.content: Smannell has a public house, a church and a school.Next to Smannell is a hamlet called Woodhouse. The fields around Smannell are mostly barley.Iam Emma, I live next to the school in the old school house. The weather vane on the school roof is in the shape of a swan.Smannell was called Swannell and a river ran through my garden.My name is Frances and I live at Middle Wyke Farm. Daddy farms the land around Middle Wyke.Daddy tells Mr.Hoath what o do ar 8am. At harvest time daddy has a trainee farmer to help with the { {FARMING }We have a new tractor with air conditioning and a radio in it.The flat {LANDSCAPE}is good for growing crops.In the winter daddy uses the office to work out the running of the farm on a computer.2 boys visit the farm with eagles and ferrets to help catch rabbits sometimes
